snippet: On Friday morning, and eight more times before Election Day, President Obama and his Republican rivals for the White House will wake up to face an uncertain political moment, when the jobs numbers are announced.
abstract: On Friday morning, and eight more times before Election Day, President Obama and his Republican rivals for the White House will wake up to face an uncertain political moment, when the jobs numbers are announced.

headline.main: Jobs Reports Offer Opportunities and Dangers for Obama and Rivals
